TilingDetermination Module Overview¶

This is the documentation for the TilingDetermination module.

Functions¶

tilepy.include.TilingDetermination.PGWinFoV(filename, ObservationTime0, PointingFile, obspar, dirName)

Mid-level function that is called by GetSchedule to compute a observation schedule based on a 2D method.

Parameters:

  • filename (str) – the name of the probability map file

  • ObservationTime0 – the desired time for scheduling to start

  • PointingFile – The text file containing the pointings that have already been performed before the scheduling

  • obspar – Class containing the telescope configuration parameters to be used in the scheduling

  • dirName – Path to the output directory where the schedules and plots will eb saved

Returns:

SuggestedPointings, ObservationTime0

rtype: ascii table, str

tilepy.include.TilingDetermination.BestCandidateonPGal(filename, ObservationTime0, galFile)
tilepy.include.TilingDetermination.PGalinFoV(filename, ObservationTime0, PointingFile, galFile, obspar, dirName)

Mid-level function that is called by GetSchedule to compute a observation schedule based on a 2D method.

Parameters:

  • filename (str) – the name of the probability map file

  • ObservationTime0 – the desired time for scheduling to start

  • PointingFile – The text file containing the pointings that have already been performed before the scheduling

  • galFile – The path to the galaxy catalog

  • obspar – Class containing the telescope configuration parameters to be used in the scheduling

  • dirName – Path to the output directory where the schedules and plots will eb saved

Returns:

SuggestedPointings, cat

rtype: ascii table, astropy table

tilepy.include.TilingDetermination.PGalinFoV_PixRegion(filename, ObservationTime0, PointingFile, galFile, obspar, dirName)

Mid-level function that is called by GetSchedule to compute a observation schedule based on a 2D method.

Parameters:

  • filename (str) – the name of the probability map file

  • ObservationTime0 – the desired time for scheduling to start

  • PointingFile – The text file containing the pointings that have already been performed before the scheduling

  • galFile – The path to the galaxy catalog

  • obspar – Class containing the telescope configuration parameters to be used in the scheduling

  • dirName – Path to the output directory where the schedules and plots will eb saved

Returns:

SuggestedPointings, cat, area

rtype: ascii table, astropy table, float
